publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2855 Mr Jim Wallace: Freedom of Information (Scotland) Bill - Stage 3—That the Parliament agrees that the Freedom of Information (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Dr Richard Simpson*
